Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Padiamunnebnesuttawy with a lappet-wig, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg-section is inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs; there is a shallow back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet(damaged).
Condition: broken into two pieces, the foot is damaged
